translations.translation: Just like that. We shall pair them with companions with large black eyes.
Thus shall it be: and We shall espouse them to fair, wide-eyed maidens.
We shall unite them to maidens with big black and white lovely eyes.
So it is; and We have wedded them to maidens with gorgeous eyes.
So (it will be). And We shall marry them to Hur (fair females) with wide lovely eyes,
Thus (shall it be), and We will wed them with Houris pure, beautiful ones.
Even so; and We shall espouse them to wide-eyed houris,
Even so (it will be). And We shall wed them unto fair ones with wide, lovely eyes.
so it will be. We shall wed them to maidens with large, dark eyes.
Even so. And We shall pair them with fair damsels large- eyed.
So shall it be, and We shall wed them to black-eyed houris.
So; and We shall join them to fair women with beautiful, big, and lustrous eyes.
So (it will be), and We shall marry them to Houris (female fair ones) with wide, lovely eyes.
As such, We shall wed them to wideeyed houris (the virgins of Paradise).
So it is, and We will wed them to lovely companions.
Thus. And We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes.

[44:54] So [shall it be] (an implied al-amru, ‘the matter’, should be read as preceding this); and We shall pair them, either in conjugality or [meaning] We shall join them, with houris of beautiful eyes, women of the fairest complexion with wide and beautiful eyes.
(Even so (it will be)) this is the station of the believers in Paradise. (And We shall wed them unto fair ones with wide, lovely eyes) and beautiful faces.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { كَذَلِكَ } ينكشف لهم الأمر بعد انقراضهم عن نشأة الدنيا وعالم الحجبات { وَ } مع ذلك القرب والوصول والوجد والحضور { زَوَّجْنَاهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ } [الدخان: 54] مصورة من الأعمال الصالحة والأخلاق المرضية والخصائل السنية التي تأدبوا بها عند ربه في النشأة الأولى

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ وزوجناهم بحُور عِينٍ } أي: قرنّاهم وأصحبناهم، ولذلك عُدي بالباء
 قال القشيري: وليس في الجنة عقد نكاح ولا طلاق، بل تمكن الوليّ من هذه الألطاف بهذه الأوصاف هـ
 والحور: جمع حَوْراء، وهي الشديدة سواد العين، والشديدة بياضها، والعين: جمع عيناء، وهي الواسعة العَين، واختلف في أنها نساء الدنيا أو غيرها
